content.description: Let R be the shaded region bounded by the graph of y = ln x and the line y = x - 2, as show above.
content.question: Write, but do not evaluate, an integral expression that can be used to find the volume of the solid generated when R is rotated about the y-axis.

frqParts.text: Write, but do not evaluate, an integral expression that can be used to find the volume of the solid generated when R is rotated about the y-axis.

topic.text: 8.11: Volume with Washer Method - Revolving Around the x- or y-Axis

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Identify how mathematical characteristics or properties of functions are related in different representations.
